name: Zengaming Inc.
description: Developer of e-sports social networking platform designed to offer a social hub for playing community-based games. The company's platform offers an internet sports discovery network and specializes in trading, buying, and selling in-game virtual assets both on centralized and decentralized platforms, enabling players to connect with teams, sponsors, and other sports enthusiasts and create their professional profiles, as well as compete with each other.
one_liner: Developer of e-sports social networking platform designed to offer a social hub for playing community-based games. The company's platform offers an internet sports discovery network and specializes in trading, buying, and selling in-game virtual assets both on centralized and decentralized platforms, enabling players to connect with teams, sponsors, and other sports enthusiasts and create their professional profiles, as well as compete with each other.
